answers.answer: Hi!In all probability your son has either eczema or dermatitis or psoriasis. Very dry skin due to Vitamin A deficiency, hypothyroidism, Sjogren's syndrome, and diabetes is another possibility. It is very difficult to diagnose this on net. Do discuss this with your doctor and get your son examined. Take care!
